name: GENESIS: MARIANING - (SHADOW SELF) MARIANO / ANOY
description:
GENESIS: 1st off from the New NFT Digital Arts Collection of  Niko Salazar (@szrn.arts), "MARIANING Original Character Arts Series 2021". 

"MARIANING", A Multi Animation Festival Awardee continues its narrative through the release of the "MARIANING Original Character Arts Series" with (SHADOW SELF) MARIANO / ANOY as the 1st from its line-up.

The Artwork was illustrated by the author himself (August 2021). 

A Genesis piece for a series of more characters to come.

_

Character Description:

WHAT: Dark Entity following MARIANING.
WHO:(SHADOW SELF) of Young MARIANO / ANOY alias "MARIANING".
WHEN: Encounters happened during Marianing's Childhood. 
WHERE: Origins of the "SHADOW SELF" come from the "Shadow Realm".
HOW: Came into existence after MARIANO's 1st encounters with the "BLACK BOOK".
